## Security Checklist

<!-- Mark relevant items with [x] - ALL security items must be checked -->

- [ ] No secrets (tokens, passwords, keys) are hardcoded or committed
- [ ] No dice roll results are logged (metadata only)
- [ ] Input validation is maintained (expression length, dice count limits)
- [ ] Authorization checks are not bypassed (userId, channelId verification)
- [ ] Rate limiting is not weakened or removed
- [ ] `crypto.randomInt()` is used for any random number generation (never `Math.random()`)
- [ ] No new security vulnerabilities introduced (ran `npm audit`)

## Code Quality Checklist

<!-- Mark relevant items with [x] - ALL code quality items must be checked -->

- [ ] My code follows the project's code style (2-space indent, Prettier formatting)
- [ ] I have run `npm run lint` and fixed any errors
- [ ] I have run `npm run format:check` and code is formatted
- [ ] I have run `npm run typecheck` and there are no type errors
- [ ] I have run `npm test` and all tests pass
- [ ] I have used `.js` extensions in TypeScript import paths
- [ ] I have added JSDoc comments for new exported functions
- [ ] I have updated error messages to be user-friendly
